description: A report finds Jersey fails to comply with UN conventions on the rights of the child.
title: Jersey children could be 'denied right to life'
title_page: Jersey children could be 'denied right to life' - BBC News
maintext: Research by the Observatory on Human Rights of Children at Swansea University found that while the island was compliant with "the majority of UNRC articles", there were "major pieces of legislation" falling short.
